医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
石榴皮提取物恢复皮肤平衡，抵抗感染石榴皮提取物通过减少金黄色葡萄球菌和促进表皮葡萄球菌生长，有效恢复皮肤微生物群平衡，显示出其作为无毒抗菌治疗的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Pomegranate-peel-extract-restores-skin-balance-fights-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Pomegranate-peel-extract-restores-skin-balance-fights-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d217b742-59f9-46b5-8d5b-e4d30f370543 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 22:33:00 -0400 Pomegranate peel extract restores skin balance, fights infections
INT-1B3增强小鼠模型的抗肿瘤免疫力并延长生存期2024年7月12日，Oncotarget第15卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“INT-1B3，一种LNP配制的miR-193a-3p模拟物，通过调节肿瘤来增强T细胞介导的免疫反应，从而促进抗肿瘤免疫”微环境和诱导免疫原性细胞死亡。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/INT-1B3-enhances-anti-tumor-immunity-and-prolongs-survival-in-mouse-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/INT-1B3-enhances-anti-tumor-immunity-and-prolongs-survival-in-mouse-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=860ad86b-bf39-46cb-a9e7-ac8d8e235319 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 22:32:39 -0400 INT-1B3 enhances anti-tumor immunity and prolongs survival in mouse models
著名外科肿瘤学家在纽约大学格罗斯曼长岛医学院担任领导职务纽约大学长岛朗格尼医院 Perlmutter 癌症中心任命著名创新外科肿瘤学家 Gary B. Deutsch（医学博士、公共卫生硕士）担任纽约大学格罗斯曼长岛医学院肿瘤外科主任。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Renowned-surgical-oncological-takes-leadership-role-at-NYU-Grossman-Long-Island-School-of-Medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Renowned-surgical-oncological-takes-leadership-role-at-NYU-Grossman-Long-Island-School-of-Medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7b7ee01-663d-4ee0-9893-80f20d125ae8 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 22:28:02 -0400 Renowned surgical oncologist takes leadership role at NYU Grossman Long Island School of Medicine
确保人工智能在医疗保健领域的可持续和负责任的使用一篇新论文强调了在医疗保健领域负责任且可持续地使用人工智能的必要性，以减轻其对环境的影响，尤其是其高碳足迹。它提供了减少能源消耗和改进可持续发展实践的建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Ensuring-sustainable-and-responsible-use-of-AI-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Ensuring-sustainable-and-responsible-use-of-AI-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96a40d2b-1c56-47a7-bd50-309647a19b08 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 21:29:00 -0400 Ensuring sustainable and responsible use of AI in healthcare
含糖饮料税可降低儿童和青少年的体重指数研究表明，城市级含糖饮料（SSB）税显着降低了儿童和青少年的体重指数（BMI）百分位数。研究结果支持 SSB 税收作为对抗儿童肥胖的可行策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Sugar-sweetened-beverage-taxes-reduce-child-and-adolescent-BMI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Sugar-sweetened-beverage-taxes-reduce-child-and-adolescent-BMI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3aafef4c-9dc1-4882-8cf4-cf955736c047 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 21:13:00 -0400 Sugar-sweetened beverage taxes reduce child and adolescent BMI
尿液中的金属与较高的心血管疾病风险和死亡率有关研究确定了尿液金属与心血管疾病 (CVD) 以及全因死亡率之间的关联。研究结果表明，尿液中的必需金属和非必需金属都可以作为心血管疾病和死亡的危险因素，强调需要采取策略来减轻这些风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Urinary-metals-linked-to-higher-cardiovian-disease-risk-and-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Urinary-metals-linked-to-higher-cardiovian-disease-risk-and-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15500f39-7f28-4bba-84c4-de6d7d8b73cb Mon, 05 Aug 2024 21:05:00 -0400 Urinary metals linked to higher cardiovascular disease risk and mortality
放疗与化疗相结合可提高寡转移性胰腺癌的生存率德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员证明，在标准化疗中添加针对转移的放射治疗可以改善寡转移胰腺癌患者的无进展生存期 (PFS)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Combining-radiation-with-chemotherapy-enhances-survival-in-oligometastatic-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Combining-radiation-with-chemotherapy-enhances-survival-in-oligometastatic-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a86c092d-3c5a-43f1-8a96-fda5f281c449 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 16:20:02 -0400 Combining radiation with chemotherapy enhances survival in oligometastatic pancreatic cancer
研究人员获得 950 万美元用于研究多酚对认知健康的影响加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的研究人员与爱尔兰共和国和北爱尔兰的研究人员合作，在欧洲资助机构的支持下，获得了美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 颁发的 950 万美元奖金；爱尔兰科学基金会 (SFI) 和公共卫生局健康与社会关怀 (HSC) -；研究多酚对认知健康和脑肠微生物组系统的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Researchers-receive-2495M-to-study-polyphens-impact-on-cognitive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Researchers-receive-2495M-to-study-polyphens-impact-on-cognitive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad9266e5-84df-4e81-a79c-188b27eff1b4 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 16:13:24 -0400 Researchers receive $9.5M to study polyphenols' impact on cognitive health
三倍体导致 42% 的马早期流产马的染色体和怀孕与人类有许多重要的相似之处，一项针对马的研究表明，怀孕前两个月的流产和自然流产中有 42% 是由于一组额外染色体（称为三倍体）的并发症造成的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Triploidy-causes-4225-of-early-miscarriages-in-horses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Triploidy-causes-4225-of-early-miscarriages-in-horses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a9d20cc-71ec-4878-9eec-4ba0a0b81e00 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 16:10:15 -0400 Triploidy causes 42% of early miscarriages in horses
21 名 Ochsner Health 护士入选 2024 年路易斯安那州 100 名伟大护士名单Ochsner Health 自豪地宣布，21 名 Ochsner 护士已被伟大 100 护士基金会提名进入 2024 年路易斯安那州 100 名伟大护士名单。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/21-Ochsner-Health-nurses-recognized-on-the-2024-Great-100-Nurses-of-Louisiana-list.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/21-Ochsner-Health-nurses-recognized-on-the-2024-Great-100-Nurses-of-Louisiana-list.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9519b2e6-a280-4989-80e4-6190405d6ca7 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 16:06:47 -0400 21 Ochsner Health nurses recognized on the 2024 Great 100 Nurses of Louisiana list
